title: AF: Apocalyptic Edition
description: This album showcases the Apocalyptic Crimson Tarot deck in all its scorched-parchment glory, featuring 40 matte-textured cards edged in sepia distressing and etched in charcoal outlines over deep crimsons, rust, and ashen grays. Each image pulses with infernal glows, smoke-veiled skies, and blood-tinted accents, bringing classic archetypes and suits to life in a desaturated, volatile palette.
